result.reason: Users need a per-profile way to choose hostname or IP at connect time, and maintainer comments indicate this specific workflow is not fully covered yet.
result.approach: Add an optional alternate address in connection profiles and a connect-time hostname/IP toggle, then route the selected endpoint into protocol launch while preserving current defaults.
